website_summaries.verdict: It's not the fastest gel polish remover, but it gets the job done without damaging or drying out nails.
pros: Contains vitamins A and E and eucalyptus oil to hydrate and nourish nails
Doesn't burn or dry out your skin
cons: Must leave the product on nails for several minutes before it begins to work

customer_reviews.title: Used the foil wrap method
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly. I’m unsure why others are having issues. I took a piece of cotton ball with the solution on it, sat it on my nail, and wrapped it in foil (for all nails). I let it sit for about 15 mins and the gel polish scraped right off.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Robles

customer_reviews.title: "Gel" polish remover??
customer_reviews.text: I expected this product to more easily remove the gel polish I purchased, but it seems to work like regular polish remover. It did not make removing my gel polish any easier, so I am not sure why it is described as a "gel" remover?
customer_reviews.author: Busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I wear gel polish and we all know it can be tough to get off. This works great. I sole a cotton pad and place these nail clip things on them for about 10 to 15 min. The gel polish is lifted and easy to file off.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle C.

customer_reviews.title: SMELLY
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT under ANY CIRCUMSTANCES buy this product!!! It removes nail polish, yes, in fact it does it well. But THE SMELL!!! It lasts on your hands FOR DAYS and makes anything you touch taste disgusting. I accidentally touched the bottle (I didn't even use it) and then touched my mouth and not even brushing my teeth and using mouthwash can get the taste out.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Tried to take off my gel nail polish and this literally did nothing. I SOAKED my nail with the gel remover for about 40 minutes in total and only the edges had just began to come off my nail. I had no more patience and decided to take it off with a nail filer. It was exhausting. Don’t bother with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Olga De Almeida

customer_reviews.title: I decided to buy the whole sensational package which is great except for this
customer_reviews.text: I get gel nails all the time. I decided to buy the whole sensational package which is great except for this. It does not work.. it will take you forever to get the polish off if you use this. Just stick with true acetone.. 15 min wrapped in acetone and the polish slips off.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Briede

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: It took the entire bottle to remove the fingernail polish. Used cotton ball, washed my hands thoroughly and when I made a salad the taste was awful due to the removal.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Works for acryllics
customer_reviews.text: Hate the baby oil scent but works AMAZING for taking off acrylic nails and extensions! Works way better than other removers I've used and it's pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Priya P.

customer_reviews.title: Gentle but effective
customer_reviews.text: It’s now my go to remover for home gel manicures. Doesn’t take a lot. No need to soak like previous brands I used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SensatioNail Gel Polish Remover SUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: Worst polish remover, will never purchase again. Doesn't remove gel polish even after soaking almost 10 minutes. It's worthless.
customer_reviews.author: kelley0320

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: works so well. Wished they had an bigger size and goes so fast but Im happy it works
customer_reviews.author: Nefetera Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Do not soak nails in this
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so hard to get off your hands. Do not soak in this! Everything I picked up to eat tasted like acetone for DAYS! Had to wear gloves!
customer_reviews.author: aTRuGem

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great for removing nail hardener which is clear. Not sure about colors.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Get it don’t wait
customer_reviews.text: This stuff right here oh yeah baby. Is the best I will keep buying it in love so easy to take off the gel absolutely 🥰
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Comes right off!
customer_reviews.text: It is really good at removing polish. I barely have to rub the cotton ball on my nail and it removes the polish. The downside is that it took about a month to arrive, but I'd buy again once I'm out.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Removed Gel FAST
customer_reviews.text: Tried for first time to remove gel at home. Smells great and did not have to soak my nails for more than a couple of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying again
customer_reviews.text: I had on gels and they came off with 3 whips fully.
customer_reviews.author: Josniel cepero

customer_reviews.title: it is OK
customer_reviews.text: works no different then regular nail polish removal from CVS
customer_reviews.author: alena

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: honestly, it will get the job done but WOW the alcohol will not leave your fingers. i washed my hands multiple times, applied lotions, and tried various other methods but nothing would remove the smell of taste of alcohol. it stayed like this for two days almost three. made eating and putting make up on basically impossible
customer_reviews.author: sheyla fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work on removing the polish. Soaking or with cotton. Even after using a drill to sand off the top coat of the polish.
customer_reviews.author: Kris B.

customer_reviews.title: This polish remover didn’t work for me!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like this remover at all. I was so frustrated soaking my nails for 30 minutes and it didn’t take any of the gel polish off! I saturated cotton balls with the remover and wrapped my nails with foil, the cotton ended up sticking to the gel polish. It was such a mess! I won’t buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely removes gel nail polish.
customer_reviews.text: It works really well and doesn't dry my nails out.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Marcum

customer_reviews.title: haven't used much
customer_reviews.text: I peeled most of the polish off (my bad) so I'm not quite sure how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed...
customer_reviews.text: It’s doesn't remove gel, just polish.. I got it to remove gel nails and the store brands work way better..
customer_reviews.author: Annee Morris

customer_reviews.title: Gel polish remover
customer_reviews.text: This produce do NOT work as expected... very disappointed not buying again....
customer_reviews.author: Busdriverkel

customer_reviews.title: Great acetone!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do. Wife is happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome except for one thing
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I cant give this a 5 star review is becuase the cap refused to stay on and create a deal after opening the first time.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Good price but didn’t work easily in getting my gel nails off.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work in Gel polish
customer_reviews.text: Did not remove or even soften gel. I even bought the clips and just didn’t work. Try another one. The smell was not bad as the other reviewers have mentioned but this is NOT a gel polish remover as stated. I even sat with it on for 30 min. Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Not too impressed
customer_reviews.text: The remover did not really work too well after the 1st 15 minutes and then an additional 15 minutes left on my nails I still had to scrape off the polish and it didn't all come off even then.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as an empty bottle
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived to me today as a empty bottle. There was absolutely no product left in the bottle. It was all absorbed into the cardboard box it was shipped in.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Uv gel polish remover
customer_reviews.text: This product works excellent and does exactly what it says
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Farias

customer_reviews.title: Smell is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance of this remover is worse than acetone alone. To make matters worse, the smell lingers. I am very unhappy with this product and will most likely be tossing it because it is not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Liang

customer_reviews.title: Will not remove gel polish!
customer_reviews.text: Should have read previous review. I was looking for acetone to remove my gel. Though this is 98% acetone, it does nothing! Don’t bother purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The foil technique worked good for this product. Finally got gel polishes off simple
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Received the product wasted out in my box and amazon wouldn't replace it ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the product wasted out in my box and amazon wouldn't replace it so I can't really judge it. But the .02% I used it didn't work for me. Its almost as though I had to scrub it, or maybe it wasn't enough to make a decision.
customer_reviews.author: Niki B

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this, it sucks
customer_reviews.text: This stuff didn’t help me remove my gel nail polish at all. All it did was dehydrate my nails and I had to scrape the gel off my nails at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Monges

customer_reviews.title: Misleading....
customer_reviews.text: Very misleading, because it doesn't remove gel polish off your hands.... This is just regular nail polish remover.... Very disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: FRUITS68

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't do anything to the geek polish. I followed the instructions exactly. Don't bother!
customer_reviews.author: Savanna Lee Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Very strong smell
customer_reviews.text: The scent is too strong, hard to deal with. The quality is good, but could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Works well.... But leaks
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for removing shellac polish, but it leaks if I leave the lid on... Which is rather annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Half full
customer_reviews.text: When I got it, it had leaked out in the box and was only half full.
customer_reviews.author: Zarate 7

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: This is a completely garbage!!!is not working as acetone is supposed to work!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryslan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Great for regular nail polish and glitter but does nothing at all for gel nail polish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scent
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the scent to strong and lasted to long!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly L Metzger

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!! Not buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! The gel polish doesn’t even come off. Don’t waste your money on this product
customer_reviews.author: dulce navarro

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is what I've been looking for gel polish remover but I wish it comes in bigger bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Frine

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Might as well attempt to use regular mail polish remover bc that's basically as well as this stuff works.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Hales

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got it from a friend and she like it !!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Decio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best UV gel nail polish out there!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Gray

customer_reviews.title: Works great for removing Gel! Just wrap cotton ball in foil, apply, and wait!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to remove Gel nail polish by taking cotton rounds, applying the remover, and wrapping the cotton puff with foil onto my nail. Works great and it's less damaging than soaking your nails/fingers in acetone. (I kept the foil on for around 30 seconds-1 minute)
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Smells like mildew and spilled I'm sure it's a health hazard
customer_reviews.text: Bought two bottles by accident one spilled out every time I tighten the bottle it just opens by itself and it smells like mildew I did not open the other bottle yet do not like it does not take off polish not worth it too late to return
customer_reviews.author: Marsha c

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other gel removers with mixed results. Should have started with this to begin with. It works perfectly, especially when combined with the nail polish remover tool. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Just rebranded acetone, nothing fancy..
customer_reviews.text: This product works but no reason to buy it for a $2+ premium off of Amazon! If you read the label, it's basically 98% acetone with some vitamins A&E and Eucalyptus oil added (who knows if 2% even does anything). I thought it would be something special, no such thing. Just buy regular acetone!
customer_reviews.author: Ketty

customer_reviews.title: I want a replacement
customer_reviews.text: Bottle had leaked and over half of the contents had spiled in the plastic bag.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: Smells super good!
customer_reviews.text: I would like to point out that I haven't tried this on gel polish yet so I'm not sure how well it works in that aspect. I ordered it because I will sometimes take my nail polish off at work and I had been told this remover smelled really nice - and it does! I feel like I'm not annoying everyone with stinky acetone smell when I use it. I'll be sure to update my review should I try it on gel polish.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions and soaked for 15 minutes... And nothing. So then I poured done in a bowl and soaked for 15 more minutes.. Then I had to pick and scrape painfully forever to get off all the polish. I'm soooo confused at these good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: S Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Fingers feel great after use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this remover. I'm not sure why others are saying it doesn't work when it definitely does. I use this to remove my gel polishes and dipping powders. Just remember it's not going to make the polish magically disappear, you still have to put in work. But, my fingers and nails don't feel dry and disgusting afterwards like using other acetone polishes. I'm on my second bottle and will be purchasing more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B

customer_reviews.title: Works great but not for those sensitive to scents
customer_reviews.text: This remover works great. It made short work of the glitter nail polish I had on. I didn't need much to get it done either. However, this has a really strong scent to it, and normally that doesn't bother me. Even a dried out cotton ball I missed during cleanup was enough to make me have to open a window. Definitely only use this in a well ventilated area.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kane

customer_reviews.title: Gel polish must
customer_reviews.text: If you are using gel polish this is a must. READ the direction and know some very nice tricks to help it work even better. Gel polish is a really different product to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cantrip

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. I soak my fingers while watching TV. After 20ish minutes the gel scrapes right off... not bad smelling either.
customer_reviews.author: MommyC

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had read reviews before I bought this. Left it on my nails for over 30 minutes and it did practically nothing.
customer_reviews.author: M Flom

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice scent and work well with remove poly gel. It was not harsh on my nails.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes D. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Water does same thing but is free
customer_reviews.text: I paid $5.99 for this and could have gotten the same use out of faucet water for free. It does nothing except smell. Not able to return so I am stuck with a smelly bottle of stuff that does nothing. It shipped fast though and was packaged very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jan-Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well, easy to use, doesn't smell horrible. Pretty normal stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Conspicuous Consumption

customer_reviews.title: Small bottle.. still u need to use half ...
customer_reviews.text: Small bottle .. still u need to use half of the bottle to get one nail polish off .
customer_reviews.author: Esther K Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Product rwmoves polish quick and easy. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Came on time. Product rwmoves polish quick and easy. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Get asatone remover from Wal-Mart and save your self the difference.
customer_reviews.author: CherRail

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This worked great and was a great buy. Would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Gel Polish Remover
customer_reviews.text: This does a nicer job on removing gel polish than standard nail polish remover.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very effective and nourishing to the skin. Takes gel polish off very well.
customer_reviews.author: Shonte'

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works the same as others, just cost a little more, still ok
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It did not remove the gel polish like I needed it to
customer_reviews.text: It did not remove the gel polish like I needed it to. worked the same as another polish remover I all ready owned
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: nice scent
customer_reviews.text: I like the scent compared to normal acetone. However, I'm having troubles to completely remove the nail polish gel from my nails with this product. I'm still trying to figure out if is something to do with the nail polish or the remover.
customer_reviews.author: ROSARIO

customer_reviews.title: what a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Wow! So I purchased this a whole ago and used it once. Didn't really work that we'll for me. It may have been me but my main complaint is that I didn't realize that the cap was defective and does not close/will not close well. I went to use it again several months later and it's all dried out. what a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: ryt

customer_reviews.title: I had better luck peeling the polish off myself than using this
customer_reviews.text: It took a LONG time for this stuff to work. I had better luck peeling the polish off myself than using this.
customer_reviews.author: Jujub

customer_reviews.title: Really works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. I put a little in a bowl, just enough to cover my nails, soaked for 5 minutes and the gel nail polish comes right off.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Rohr

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't burn my fingers
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work to removed, but with Gel polish you need to leave this on for a long time. This one doesn't burn as some other ones have
customer_reviews.author: Annditel

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again or recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Does not remove gel polish with out soaking. Bought this thinking it would, rubbed my nail with a soaked cotton ball no color was coming off. Will not buy again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deandra Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Only works if you have the foil packages I believe, or you have to soak in the polish remover for a long time. Did some damage to my nails trying to get the gel polish off.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Clark

product_meta.title: SensatioNail Gel Nail Polish Remover, 8 fl oz, 98% Acetone, Vitamins A & E
product_meta.description: The SensatioNail Gel Polish Remover is uniquely formulated to quickly, gently and effectively remove SensatioNail Gel Polish without drying the skin or natural nail. The acetone-based formula contains nourishing ingredients including Vitamins A & E, and Eucalyptus Oil to help condition the natural nail as it removes color.
feature_bullets: NAIL POLISH REMOVER: Featuring eucalyptus oil with vitamins A & E, this nail polish remover is designed to remove gel polish colors without drying out your skin & natural nails.
GEL POLISH: Hard gel nail polishes last longer than regular nail polish, & help prevent chipped nails, peeled nails, & damaged nail beds. A UV LED lamp is required to cure & dry the polish.

IMPRESSIVE NAILS: Keep your natural nails healthy by applying essential oil, such as castor oil & rosehip oil, to your nail beds before applying base coats & nail protectors so you can show off your latest design.
LONG LASTING NAILS: Unlike slow-drying nail lacquers & ordinary polish that chips, SensatioNail polishes are easy to apply & dry in seconds with our LED nail drying lamp. Polish lasts for 2 weeks.
SENSATIONAIL: Obtain a professional manicure right at home with SensatioNail gel nail polish & manicure tools. Try our gel nail polish starter kits with an exclusive LED lamp.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
